name: begrudge
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to feel unhappy because someone has something that you think they do not deserve: [ + two objects ] I don't begrudge him his freedom.
to feel unhappy about spending money on something or spending time doing something: They begrudged every day they had to stay with their father. [ + -ing verb ] She begrudged paying so much for an ice cream cone.
